title: Wanted: Paul Hines Buchner Gold Coin and Old Judge
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Wanted: Paul Hines Buchner Gold Coin and Old Judge
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tom Hines
I am still looking for my great-great-grand uncle Paul Hines cards. I would love to make an offer for the Buchner's and Old Judge just sold in the REA or any others that are out there. Please let me know at fouder@aol.com. Thank you.

Tom Hines
